Instructions

Navigation
--------------
1. [Mouse Scroll] Use to navigate slices of the axial, sagittal, and coronal planes.
2. [Mouse Right Click (and drag)] Use to zoom

Image Layers
--------------
1. [CT windowing] Press the WindowLevel button and use left-click.

Contour Editing
--------------
1. [Manual Brush] Use Circle Brush/Eraser to edit contours
2. [AI Scribble] Make foreground/background scribbles to edit contours.

Contouring Shortcuts
--------------
1. [c] Show/unshow contours (only in non-expert mode)
2. [+/-] To change the brush/eraser size
3. [q/w] To activate brush/eraser tools
4. [f/g] To activate Foreground/Background AI-scribble
Other Shortcuts
--------------
1. [r] Reset views
2. [Esc] To disable all tools
3. [←,→] Left/right arrow keys to change slice Id for active view
Manual vs AI-assisted Contour Refinement
